price: 92. Alobi: Kobanda lelo oyo etumbu ezali te тропа bino. Allah alimbisa bino, ye nde azali na ngolu koleka.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَثۡرِيبَ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ يَغۡفِرُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā tathrība ʿalaykumu al-yawma yaghfiru al-lahu lakum wahuwa arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
